tool.name: RNA-Seq TruSeq Stranded STAR Optimized Workflow
tool.version: SAMTOOLS: 1.2; BWA: 0.7.12; PICARD: 1.134; JAVA: jre1.7.0_51; GATK: GenomeAnalysisTK-3.4-46
tool.command:
BRI_RNASEQ_Truseq_stranded_sr_GRCm38_v0.2_STAR_complete_optimized_20180420.py --sample-name $sample --lane1 $input_lane_1 --lane2 $input_lane_2 --lane3 $input_lane_3 --lane4 $input_lane_4 --lane5 $input_lane_5 --lane6 $input_lane_6 --lane7 $input_lane_7 --lane8 $input_lane_8
##use precomputed indexes --star-ref "${star_index.fields.path}" --picard-ref "${picard_index.fields.path}"
--gtf $gtf_file --refflat-file $refflat_file --ribosomal-file $ribosomal_list
## output vcf file --output-concatenated-fastq $output_contatenate_fastq --output-star-bam $output_star_bam --output-picard-markDuplicates-html $output_picard_markDuplicates_html --output-picard-markDuplicates-directory $output_picard_markDuplicates_html.extra_files_path --output-picard-alignmentSummary $output_picard_alignmentSummary --output-picard-alignmentSummary-directory $output_picard_alignmentSummary.extra_files_path --output-picard-collectRnaSeqSummary $output_picard_collectRnaSeqSummary --output-picard-collectRnaSeqSummary-directory $output_picard_collectRnaSeqSummary.extra_files_path --output-tophatStats $output_tophatStats --output-htseq-counts $output_htseqcount_counts --output-htseq-log $output_htseqcount_log --output-fastqc-html $output_fastqc_html --output-fastqc-text $output_fastqc_text --output-log $output_log
## globus parameters ##--username $username ##--goauth-token "$goauth" ##--source-ep=$from_endpoint ##--destination-ep="$to_endpoint" ##--destination-dir="$to_dir" ##--deadline=1200 > $output_log

param.help: If your genome of interest is not listed, contact the GlobusGenomics team
param.label: Select a Starreference genome
param.name: star_index

param.label: Location of rRNA sequences in genome, in interval_list format
param.name: ribosomal_list

param.help: Should be the similar to the reference genome chosen for Star
param.label: Select a Picard built-in reference genome
param.name: picard_index
